#### generating plot theme ####
theme_leo <- function(base_size = 6,
                      base_family = "Helvetica") {
                        theme_minimal(
                          base_size = base_size,
                          base_family = base_family
                        ) %+replace%
                        theme(
                          strip.text = element_text(
                            hjust = 0,
                            # face = "italic"
                          ),
                          axis.ticks = element_line(
                            linewidth = 0.125,
                            lineend = "square",
                            color = "black"
                          ),
                          axis.text.x = element_text(
                            size = 6,
                            colour = "black",
                            margin = margin(1, 1, 1, 1)
                          ),
                          axis.text.y = element_text(
                            colour = "black",
                            size = 6,
                            angle = 0,
                            vjust = 0.5,
                            hjust = 1,
                            margin = margin(1, 1, 1, 1)
                          ),
                          axis.title = element_text(
                            colour = "black",
                            size = 6
                          ),
                          panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
                          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
                          panel.border = element_rect(fill = NA, color = "black", linewidth = 0.25),
                          panel.spacing = unit(1.5, "mm"),
                          legend.position = "none",
                          legend.text = element_text(size = 6),
                          legend.key.height = unit(4, "mm"),
                          plot.title = element_text(
                            size = 6,
                            hjust = 0
                          ),
                          complete = TRUE
                        )
                        }

## 2023-04 Wiesner/AF pilot

```{r}
## Load AF
af_data <- read_tsv("/data/2023_zfp2/Silique_imaging/AF/zfp_AF.tsv") |>
           group_by(genotype, replicate) |>
           mutate(relative = value / mean(value[cell_type == "parenchyma"])) |>
           filter(!(cell_type %in% c("parenchyma", "repulum")))

af_plot <- ggplot(af_data,
                  aes(x = genotype,
                      y = value)) +
           geom_violin(
#              aes(fill = genotype),
             fill = pal_ostwald_disc[1],
             draw_quantiles = 0.5,
             # fill = "white",
             colour = "black",
             alpha = 0.75,
             width = 0.5,
             size = 0.2,
             scale = "width"
           ) +
           geom_quasirandom(
             shape = 21,
             fill = "white",
             colour = "black",
             stroke = 0.1,
             alpha = 1,
             size = 1,
             width = 0.2
           ) +
           stat_summary(
             aes(
               group = replicate,
#                fill = genotype
             ),
             fill = "black",
             colour = "white",
             shape = 23,
             stroke = 0.2,
             fun = "mean",
             geom = "point",
             na.rm = TRUE
           ) +
           scale_fill_manual(values = pal_ostwald_disc[c(1,3)]) +
           facet_wrap(~cell_type) +
           labs(
             x = "Genotype",
             y = "Lignin autofluorescence"
           ) +
           theme_leo() +
           theme(axis.title.x = element_blank())

## Load Wiesner
W_data <- read_tsv("/data/2023_zfp2/Silique_imaging/Wiesner/zfp_Wiesner.tsv") |>
           filter(!(cell_type %in% c("parenchyma", "repulum")))

W_plot <- ggplot(W_data,
                  aes(x = genotype,
                      y = absorbance)) +
          geom_violin(
#             aes(fill = genotype),
            fill = pal_ostwald_disc[3],
            draw_quantiles = 0.5,
            # fill = "white",
            colour = "black",
            alpha = 0.75,
            width = 0.5,
            size = 0.2,
            scale = "width"
          ) +
          geom_quasirandom(
            shape = 21,
            fill = "white",
            colour = "black",
            stroke = 0.1,
            alpha = 1,
            size = 1,
            width = 0.2
          ) +
          stat_summary(
            aes(
              group = replicate,
#               fill = genotype
            ),
            fill = "black",
            colour = "white",
            shape = 23,
            stroke = 0.2,
            fun = "mean",
            geom = "point",
            na.rm = TRUE
          ) +
          scale_fill_manual(values = pal_ostwald_disc[c(1,3)]) +
          facet_wrap(~cell_type) +
          labs(
            x = "Genotype",
            y = "Wiesner absorbance"
          ) +
          theme_leo() +
          theme(axis.title.x = element_blank())

pdf("zfp_pilot.pdf", width = onecol, height = onecol)
W_plot / af_plot & theme(plot.margin = margin(10,1,10,1))
dev.off()

```
